name: Polymag
description:
Traveling through the Kuiper Belt Digi-Highway, you've noticed something is wrong. No one is responding from flight control, and the lane is suspiciously empty. Suddenly, the highway starts disintegrating behind you!

Run from it as long as you can. Try to stay within the bounds of the highway to keep your speed as fast as possible.

Default controls:

W: forward

A: strafe left

S: backward

D: strafe right

shift: down

space: up

up arrow: pitch up

left: turn left

down: pitch down

right: turn left

As of time of submission, this game has no sound. I might add some later, so keep an eye out!

source: https://github.com/crassSandwich/Polymag
